item.title: Styling Lazy Trader
item.description: Conversation with ChatGPT when developing Lazy Trader You: In plain css, I want the label, input box and the button to appear in a single row in the middle of the screen. ChatGPT: To create a layout with a label, input box, and button in a single row in the middle of the screen using CSS, you can use the display: flex property to create a flex container, the justify-content: center property to center the elements horizontally, and the align-items: center property to center the elements vertically.
